attributes.action: Respect the BBC's independence with respect to the content of Russell Brand's Radio 2 broadcast of 18th October 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst the readers of a number of tabloid newspapers may have an interest in telephone calls broadcast on Russell Brand's BBC Radio 2 show on 18th October 2008, this should not be an area of concern for the Prime Minister or his cabinet.

Demands for the BBC to take "appropriate action" seem out of place when the Prime Minster and his government have more pressing issues such as the current financial crisis and the UK's slide into recession.
